headline: Snack Wrap unwrapped: Here's why McDonald's is bringing back a fan favorite on July 10
summary: If McDonald’s ever doubted it needed to bring back the Snack Wrap, consider this: Nine years after the fast-food powerhouse discontinued the item in the U.S., customers have continued to order it at drive-thrus.  On Tuesday, McDonald's announced that a new version of the Snack Wrap will go on sale July 10.  McDonald's invented the Snack Wrap — a tortilla full of chicken, lettuce, shredded cheese and sauce — almost two decades ago to make it easier to eat its chicken on the go.

headline: Subway-owner Roark Capital buys Dave's Hot Chicken for $1 billion with rapid expansion plans underway
summary: Restaurant chain Dave's Hot Chicken is now owned by the same private equity firm that is behind Subway and Dunkin'.
